name: Hockey
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to the 19th Winter Olympic Games held in Salt Lake City (USA) in 2002
averseDescription: On the coin obverse there is a semicircular conventionalized depiction of a snowflake fragment, upon which there are the inscriptions УКРАЇНА (Ukraine) and the small National Emblem of Ukraine; below and on the right, against the mirror background there are inscriptions:
